name: Cxense
description: Data Management Platform with intelligent personalization. Cxense helps hundreds of leading publishers and marketers across the globe transform their raw data into their most valuable resource.

siteId.label: Site Id
validators: Please enter your Cxense Site Id.

customerPrefix.description: Maintained by Cxense a so called 'customer prefix' can be configured on site-group level provided that the prefix string is available and permitted to use on the customerId you belong to. It is a three character lower-case alpha-numeric string, like 'xyz', 'cxn' or 'cx2'. Ask your Cxense Onboarding or Support contact about your customer prefix
customerPrefix.label: Customer Prefix

origin.description: The Cxense origin for events from this Segment source. Differentiates various DMP applications used by the customer
origin.label: Origin

persistedQueryId.description: The Cxense Persisted Query Id for events from this Segment source
persistedQueryId.label: Persisted Query Id
